> 
> ![OracleParameterizedTestCases](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/48581379/119298783-53ed6c00-bc7b-11eb-9761-2979a5d08210.png)

@ThanoshanMV Copy `OracleStatement.g4` to `imports/oracle`, then test `execute` rule with `antlr plugin`, you will find  reason of  the problem.

```sql
SELECT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM table)
```
